Articles.Content:
Hey,

Have have a spaceplane with fueltanks next to each other, but i want one engine to use one tank and another to use a different tank

Plane seen from the side

----<
----<

Right now both engines (represented by '<') use the fuel from both tanks (represented by '----') and i was wondering if it was possible to disable the link. between the two tanks, since one consists of liquid fuel and oxidizer while the other dont.

Thanks in advance!
Right clicking on certain parts and selecting "disable cross feed" may help you solve this. Not sure, but you might need to turn on "advanced tweakables" in the settings before you see this option.
